extendedInfo.description: ICON POP Quiz challenges players to name famous people, hit movie and TV shows and characters using imaginative, handcrafted visual clues inspired by each answer. The more accurately and quickly you respond, the better the score youâll have to compete against friends worldwide on Game Center! Can you guess all the icons?ICON POP FEATURES:HUNDREDS OF STUNNING ICONSOver 1000 original handcrafted icons are waiting to be guessed and figured out. Thatâs right, we drew each and every one and there are more to come!HELP WHEN YOU NEED ITEveryone solves puzzles differently. In Icon Pop Quiz we offer five different ways for players to get back on track, all available through spending points earned with correct guesses. Pick up some general knowledge about the movie/TV by using âHintâ, remove incorrect letters with âEliminate Keysâ, or use the âOpen Lettersâ to figure out the right word! If all else fails, players can always âAsk a Friendâ on Facebook or Twitter, or âRevealâ the answer with accumulated points as a last resort.** ICON POP Quiz is an app made for fans by fans. This is an expression of our gratitude to all leaders, heroes, inventors, musicians, athletes, artist, writers, directors, authors, production studios, animators, actresses, and actors that constantly shaping our world and inspire us with their work. BRAVO! **Website:www.iconpopquiz.comOnline Shop:www.iconpopshop.comFacebook:fb.me/iconpopquizTwitter:twitter.com/iconpopquiz

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This game is amazing, i really like minimal icons you guys did, lots of fun. Plus I love sharing and rating for tokens, instead of IAP.

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: This game is really good for someone that likes a brain teaser.  There are alot if subjects like famous people tv characters and programmes and films. It is game for people like my friend robbie. He did a level 6 exam in sats!!!!

reviews.title: Good.

reviews.title: What an amazing game!
reviews.comment: The icon designs are outrageously good & the concept of the game is amazing, i completely adore every bit of the game. But for some reason on my X2 it will force close to the start up screen after typing in 4 or 5 answers, please fix :)
reviews.author: Jonathan Morales

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Brill game. Only wish pics were a bit more realistic but otherwise enjoy playing. Some of the people I, ve never heard of but all in all its good to play

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Fun and simple top play this app us good. I enjoyed using it and so do my friends

reviews.title: Icon pop quiz
reviews.comment: Pictures could be a bit more helpful for my liking. And a lot of young ones woudnt have a clue who half the people where. But on the up side it keeps me entertained for ages . Could also maybe write under logos what icon stands for what
